about_the_game:
The upgraded and new Stella Gear usable in “Relayer Advanced”.
Players can gain advantage in battle by using this ultra-high performance Stella Gear exclusively for Milky Way: the one with the will of Milky Way Galaxy.

【Available items】
・Galaxy Star NEXT
・Milky Way's battle data + (custom chip)

＊This is a separately sold "Galaxy Star NEXT" product.
＊There is also a bargain bundle set, "Relayer Advanced EXTRA PACK" which includes this product, and a "Stellar Gear NEXT Pack" which players can purchase 9 DLC mechas at a bargain price. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
＊To use this content, the main game product (sold separately) is required. Also, if players need to apply the latest patch, please use this content after updating.

Players can get Milky Way’s exclusive new Stella Gear "Galaxy Star NEXT" and the custom chip, " Milky Way's battle data +".
This new Stella Gear can be used by going to "Training" > "Hangar" > "Switch" menu after Milky Way joins the team in the game.

＊DLC Stellar Gear have higher stats and exclusive custom bonuses that make them more powerful than even the standard models that are upgraded to the maximum level.
＊DLC Stellar Gear cannot be upgraded.

name: Relayer Advanced - Milky Way's Galaxy Star NEXT

package_groups.name: default

package_groups.title: Buy Relayer Advanced - Milky Way's Galaxy Star NEXT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-6402P
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible soundcard

short_description: The next-generation Stella Gear "Galaxy Star NEXT" exclusively for Milky Way is now available. Defeat the Relayer forces with a fully customized Stella Gear and a custom chip bearing the name of Milky Way!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
